 2013-10872013-10-09,  AANDC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAddition to Pavilion Indian Reserve No. 1 (British Columbia)
PrecisOrder setting apart 2.98 hectares (7.36 acres) of land for the use and benefit of the TS'KW'AYLAXW FIRST NATION as an addition to PAVILION INDIAN RESERVE No. 1, in British Columbia.
